## NavigationItemHookResult.tooltip property

Tooltip displayed when hovering over the navigation item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly tooltip?: string;
```

## Remarks

If not provided, [NavigationItemHookResult.label](./extensions.navigationitemhookresult.label.md) property is used instead of it.
